title: Performance Configuration
description: Configuration schema for Harmony performance budgets and limits

renderBudgetMs.description: Maximum render time per frame in milliseconds (for 60fps)

memoryBudgetMB.description: Maximum WASM heap size in megabytes

loadBudgetMs.description: Maximum initial load time in milliseconds

audioLatencyMs.description: Maximum audio processing latency in milliseconds

enableProfiling.description: Enable performance profiling and metrics collection

warningThreshold.description: Threshold (as fraction of budget) to trigger warnings
